item.description:
Important!  This meetup has been cancelled due to SeaView Lanes closing for snowstorm.  Will reschedule

 

Saturdays from 8pm - 11pm the Naval base's Seaview Lanes has Xtreme bowling, also called Cosmic or Disco bowling at other places, so come join us for bowling under the black lights and DJ!  The cost is $3.50 per person per game + $2.50 for shoes.  They have a bar, gaming area for kids, a full kitchen and TV's.  Full disclosure, I'm TERRIBLE at bowling, but always have a ton of fun doing it.  Don't worry about coming by yourself, most of us do to these meetups.  You'll find the group very welcoming and friendly.

Civilians are welcome at Seaview lanes, but do need a way to get on base, so we'll carpool in from Newport Mall parking lot. Park near JT Connell Hwy, across from Stop n Shop. I'll be in my red Mini Cooper.  I can take myself plus 3 other people.  If you can get on base, the address for the bowling alley is:

Seaview Lanes Bowling Center
Location: Building 656, Whipple Street

Better yet, if you're able to carpool others, please leave that in the comment section (I can possibly do multiple trips between the bowling alley and the mall, but I'd rather not spend all night doing that *).

As always, please actually RSVP if you plan on coming and attend if you RSVP.  Your hosts greatly appreciate that. *)

IMPORTANT - if fewer than 4 people have RSVP'd by 3pm that day, I will cancel the meetup, so if you RSVP'd yes, please check to see if it's happening before you head over, and if you RSVP, please show up.

Look forward to seeing you all there!

~Erinn
item.how_to_find_us: Park near JT Connell Hwy across from Stop n Shop, I'll be in Mini Cooper, red w/black stripes
item.name: Xtreme Bowling at Seaview Lanes - Naval Base! *)
